name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】遂に復帰‼重大告知ライブ【#星街すいせい重大告知】 [CPUYPXa7D7s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Comet Medley' by Hoshimachi Suisei and Taku Inoue.
Performance of 'Anti-gravity Girl' by Hoshimachi Suisei and Taku Inoue, featuring AZKi as a special guest.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい願いを
subtitles.english: The wishes I want to come true,

subtitles.original: 浮かべた光は
subtitles.english: the floating light

subtitles.original: ずっと出会いを待ってる
subtitles.english: has been waiting for a meeting all this time.

subtitles.original: 早く見つけてよ
subtitles.english: Find me quickly.

subtitles.original: 理想描いただけじゃきっとまだ進めない
subtitles.english: Just imagining ideals won't let me move forward.

subtitles.original: 踏み出したばかりだけど
subtitles.english: I've only just taken the first step,

subtitles.original: いつかその心に
subtitles.english: but someday in that heart,

subtitles.original: 満開の華を咲かせよ
subtitles.english: let's make flowers bloom in full glory.

subtitles.original: 夢中にさせてみせるから
subtitles.english: I'll make you fall head over heels,

subtitles.original: 次元さえも超えるくらい
subtitles.english: so much so that we cross through dimensions.

subtitles.original: とびきりのドリームを
subtitles.english: An extraordinary dream,

subtitles.original: あげる今夜は覚めないで
subtitles.english: I'll give you. Don't wake up tonight.

subtitles.original: 一度きりの瞬間だって大事なの
subtitles.english: Even a once-in-a-lifetime moment is precious.

subtitles.original: ほら行くよ 彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Here we go! Starlight of the comet.

subtitles.original: 数えきれないほどの星が
subtitles.english: Countless stars

subtitles.original: 蠢めき違う色で光っている
subtitles.english: shimmer and glow in different colors.

subtitles.original: んだ その中で私は
subtitles.english: In the midst of that, what kind of

subtitles.original: 何が残せるのかな きっと
subtitles.english: mark can I leave? Surely,

subtitles.original: 誰よりも蒼く 強い光を
subtitles.english: a blue and stronger light than anyone else.

subtitles.original: 満天の星を降らせよ
subtitles.english: Let's make a sky full of stars rain down.

subtitles.original: 眩いほど煌めくよ
subtitles.english: It will sparkle blindingly.

subtitles.original: 何もかも忘れるくらい とびきりのステージを
subtitles.english: To the point of forgetting everything, an extraordinary stage!

subtitles.original: 満天の星を降らせよ
subtitles.english: Let's make a sky full of stars rain down.

subtitles.original: 眩いほど煌めくよ
subtitles.english: It will sparkle blindingly.

subtitles.original: 何もかも忘れるくらい とびきりのステージを
subtitles.english: To the point of forgetting everything, an extraordinary stage!

subtitles.original: あげる今夜は眠れない
subtitles.english: I'll give you. I can't sleep tonight.

subtitles.original: 踊り回るほど踊らせて
subtitles.english: Let's dance until we're spinning around.

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ていてね 彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Keep your eyes on me, Starlight of the comet.

subtitles.original: 彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Starlight of the comet.

subtitles.original: 彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Starlight of the comet.

subtitles.original: アンチグラビティ・ガール
subtitles.english: Anti-gravity Girl

subtitles.original: 作詞：MCTC／作曲・編曲：TAKU INOUE
subtitles.english: Lyrics: MCTC / Composition & Arrangement: TAKU INOUE

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 鼻がツンとしそうなほど西日が差して
subtitles.english: The evening sun shines so bright my nose might sting,

subtitles.original: また迷子になって下らして風引いて
subtitles.english: getting lost again, wandering and catching a cold.

subtitles.original: 探すよ今日もちょっとおかしな色した
subtitles.english: Today too, I'm looking for the dream fragments

subtitles.original: ガラクタみたいな夢のパーツを
subtitles.english: that look like junk with slightly odd colors.

subtitles.original: 虹色のコクピットで見よう見まねで
subtitles.english: In the rainbow-colored cockpit, I imitate and

subtitles.original: 不鮮明なネジを回して指切って
subtitles.english: turn unclear screws, cutting my fingers.

subtitles.original: でたらめなメロディ スケッチもなくて
subtitles.english: Haphazard melodies, without even a sketch,

subtitles.original: それでも鼓動揺らして空を飛んでみたい
subtitles.english: but still, shaking my heartbeat, I want to try flying in the sky.

subtitles.original: 思わず飛んでみたいんだ
subtitles.english: I just want to try flying.

subtitles.original: 今夜のスペシャルゲスト、この方！
subtitles.english: Tonight's special guest, this person!

subtitles.original: いつか 0（ゼロ）から 10（じゅう）まで
subtitles.english: Someday, from 0 to 10,

subtitles.original: 見たことないスピードで君も乗せて
subtitles.english: carrying you at a speed you've never seen before,

subtitles.original: 夢中な 逆さだってさ 今までの
subtitles.english: enthralled, even upside down, from everything

subtitles.original: 全部を 解いていたい 暴きたい
subtitles.english: so far, I want to unravel, I want to expose it all.

subtitles.original: 止まらない ソワソワ ドキドキしちゃうな
subtitles.english: I can't stop, getting all fidgety and heart-pounding.

subtitles.original: 弾みも無く全部を落として間違えて
subtitles.english: Dropping everything without a bounce and making mistakes.
